""" UDF """

# Original SAS code:
# case when STATUS_NOTA = 12 then 1 when  BDG_BET_DOOR_CVZ  ^=  0 then 1 else 0 end
# Auto-generated pyspark code:
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType


@udf(returnType=IntegerType())
def cz_sas_br_cvz_regeling_idc(status_nota, bdg_bet_door_cvz) -> int:
    if status_nota == 12 or bdg_bet_door_cvz != 0:
        return 1
    return 0
